sentence.Network_en: At Merlin's instigation, Arthur founds the Fellowship of the Round Table.
sentence.Network_cn: 在梅林的建议下，亚瑟王创建了圆桌骑士团。

sentence.Network_en: At Kukhar's instigation he joined the restaurant as an apprentice chef.
sentence.Network_cn: 在库哈里的鼓动下，他到餐馆做了厨师学徒。

sentence.Network_en: An appeal fund was launched at the instigation of the President.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统授意发起了一项救援基金。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Yesterday ' s riot broke out at the instigation of an unknown politician ., 昨日的暴乱是由一个不知名的政客煽动起来的.
At India ' s instigation , the paragraph which this phrase appeared was reshuffled , leaving its meaning unclear ., 在印度的鼓动下 , 这一短语所在的段落似乎得重新更正 , 使其不清楚化.

list.abs: if the instigated person does not commit the instigated crime , the instigator may be a lesser punishment or a mitigated punishment .如果被教唆的人没有犯被教唆的罪，对于教唆犯，可以从轻或者减轻处罚。
instigation 鼓动instigation therapy 鼓舞治疗法instigator 激励者
英语语言词典  # 翻译 ... ... 主谋者 principal conspirator;principal plotter 主谋 chief instigator;head of a conspiracy.
dream ego 梦中自我dream instigator 梦之缘起dream interpretation 梦的解释梦之解析

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'incitement'): from Old French, or from Latin instigatio(n-), from the verb instigare (see instigation)

entry.def: Someone who instigates an event causes it to happen.

example.ex: Jenkinson instigated a refurbishment of the old gallery...
example.tran: 詹金森促成了老美术馆的重新整修。

example.ex: The violence over the last forty-eight hours was instigated by ex-members of the secret police.
example.tran: 过去 48 小时的暴力事件是在前秘密警察的煽动下爆发的。

means.word_mean: 1. the verbal act of urging on
2. deliberate and intentional triggering (of trouble or discord)

auth_sentence.content: At my instigation work was started on a Guide to Royalty.
auth_sentence.res_content: At my instigation work was started on a Guide to Royalty.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At my instigation work was started on a Guide to Royalty.

auth_sentence.content: This will allow mobilizing networks and further instigation of relevant and action-oriented reflection, studies and analyses.
auth_sentence.res_content: This will allow mobilizing networks and further instigation of relevant and action-oriented reflection, studies and analyses.

sentences.en: Yesterday’s riot broke out at the instigation of an unknown politician.
sentences.cn: 昨日的暴乱是由一个不知名的政客煽动起来的。

sentences.en: At his instigation we conceal the fact from the authorities.
sentences.cn: 我们受他的怂恿向当局隐瞒了事实。
